titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2218) to amend the charter school program under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1892) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2012 for intelligence and intelligence-related activities of the United States Government, the Community Management Account, and the Central Intelligence Agency Retirement and Disability System, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-200, by Ms. Foxx.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 70.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 392.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 176 (Roll no. 693).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 237 - 163 (Roll no. 694).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/7/2011--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2218) to amend the charter school program under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965, and providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1892) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2012 for intelligence and intelligence-related activities of the United States Government, the Community Management Account, and the Central Intelligence Agency Retirement and Disability System.
